text: The provisions of this part governing the legal effect, validity, or enforceability of electronic records or signatures, and of contracts formed or performed with the use of such records or signatures conform to the requirements of section 102 of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 5 U.S.C. § 7002) ("Act"), and supersede, modify, and limit the Act.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 19 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act. See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 47-2887.18

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
